channel.title: JCSM's 2006-2008 Weekly Devotions
channel.description: Be encouraged by our html and mp3 weekly devotional messages! Please visit www.jcsm.org for our ministry, which consists of over 200,000 web pages.
channel.itunes:author: JCSM
channel.itunes:subtitle: JCSM's Weekly Devotions
channel.itunes:summary: Listen and be encouraged with truth from the Word of God! Our weekly devotional messages and select sermons will bless you! Visit http://jcsm.org!
channel.itunes:keywords: JCSM, weekly devotions, Bible, scriptures, sermons, God, Jesus, Christ

item.title: Turn Failure Into Success
item.description: God gives us the tools to turn failure into success. We need to repent, confess, and do things right the next time.
item.guid: Christians should be learning from their failures, so they can be successful and obedient citizens for Christ.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: turn, failure, into, success, repent, confess, Jesus, God, learn

item.title: Tetelestai: It Is Finished
item.description: Jesus Christ said, "It is finished" when He died on the cross for our sins. His work was complete and it was emphasized by several miraculous events.
item.guid: Know that Jesus came to do what He intended to do and that we are now responsible to have faith and glorify Him with our actions.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: tetelestai, it, is, finished, died, cross, sins, Jesus, work, ministry, flesh

item.title: We Are All Teachers and Leaders
item.description: Every person will teach in some capacity. We all need to be the best teachers we can be. Teaching someone is also leading them because teaching is leading someone into truth.
item.guid: Prepare yourself to teach and if you prove yourself faithful with one person or two people, God may entrust more to you.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: we, are, all, teachers, leaders, spiritual, gift, spirit

item.title: The Acts of the Holy Spirit
item.description: The book of Acts outlines the acts of the Holy Spirit and not simply the acts of the apostles.
item.guid: After the resurrection and ascension, the Holy Spirit was poured out and entered the hearts of believers to stay, helping them do miraculous things and live holy lives.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: acts, holy, spirit, Jesus, rose, grave, miracles, Pentecost, tongues

item.title: The Savior Has Risen!
item.description: Jesus died on the cross and rose from the grave. He is the only person to ever predict His death and resurrection and be accurate.
item.guid: Consider what He has done for you because He has given everything so that you could be redeemed.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: savior, has, risen, rose, grave, resurrection

item.title: The Debt We Cannot Repay
item.description: Jesus Christ paid the price for our sins on the cross. He gave His life so we might live.
item.guid: Thank Him and be mindful of His amazing sacrifice because we can never repay the debt we owe to Him.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: debt, we, cannot, repay, price, ransom, Jesus, Christ, paid, sins, cross

item.title: We're Never Alone
item.description: We are never alone because God is always faithful. Remember that God is always there.
item.guid: Trust in God and seek Him before, during, and after your time of need.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: we're, never, alone, God, is faithful

item.title: The Called, The Chosen, The Elect
item.description: God has called and chosen the elect. We should be eternally thankful for this awesome blessing.
item.guid: While we were unbelieving sinners, Christ died for us and drew us to His side for forgiveness, salvation, and redemption.
item.itunes:author: JCSM

item.title: God's Model For Managing Money
item.description: Christians need to be wise with their money. They should not be controlled by it.
item.guid: Obey God with and be a good steward of your resources and God will bless you.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: God's, model, for, managing, money, steward, resources, invest, love, fool

item.title: God's Model For Successful Communication
item.description: In order to truly listen, you must listen without thinking your own thoughts. Think, listen, and speak effectively.
item.guid: Be wise and don't talk just to be heard, but work on actively listening and having meaningful conversations.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: God's, model, for, successful, communication, listen, think, speak, meditate, love

item.title: Leading People to Jesus Christ
item.description: All Christians should be actively leading people to Jesus Christ for salvation and eternal life. We know how wonderful it is to be saved and our joy should spill over into the lives of others.
item.guid: Pray for courage and boldness so you can obey the Great Commission and lead others to Christ.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: leading, people, to, Jesus, Christ, salvation, great, commission, eternal, life, witnessing, testimony

item.title: Discover Your Gifts and Ministry
item.description: Every believer has been given at least one spiritual gift to be used for God's glory.
item.guid: We need to discover our gift (or gifts) and begin using it (or them) to minister to others.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: discover, your, gifts, ministry, spiritual, prophecy, helps, exhortation, tongues, miracles

item.title: Have You Been Baptized?
item.description: Saved believers should be baptized in water because it is commanded in the Bible. Baptism is an outward sign of an inward change.
item.guid: Baptism doesn't save anyone, but baptism is a step of faith and obedience that all Christians should take.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: have, you, been, baptized, water, Bible, obedience, faith, baptize, baptism

item.title: Quality Christian Fellowship
item.description: Christian fellowship is essential for Christian growth and Christian living. We all need to be encouraging other believers and we also need their encouragement.
item.guid: Make it a point to have quality Christian fellowship in your life.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: quality, Christian, fellowship, growth, living, essential, iron, sharpens, discipleship

item.title: God's Cure For Worry, Doubt, and Fear
item.description: We have no reason to worry, doubt, or fear because God is faithful. His love casts out fear.
item.guid: Trust in Jesus Christ and your worries, doubts, and fears will be relieved.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: God's, cure, for, worry, doubt, fear, faith, trust, Jesus, Christ, belief

item.title: Prayerfully Persevering Through Persecution
item.description: Christians will suffer persecution in this life. We will be discriminated against and even looked down upon by some people.
item.guid: Decide now to stand strong and persevere through prayer and faithful obedience to Jesus Christ.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: prayerfully, preserving, through, persecution, pray, prayer, suffer, persecute

item.title: Jesus and the Christmas Account
item.description: Jesus Christ was born of a virgin in a manger in Bethlehem. He came to save the world from its sins. Jesus is uncreated and part of the triune Godhead, existing before time began. He died on the cross for our sins and rose from the grave.
item.guid: Celebrate Jesus' birth because His life makes our salvation and eternal life possible.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: Jesus, Christmas, account, Mary, virgin, Bethlehem, salvation, save, world, love

item.title: From Milk to Meat
item.description: Christians should be studying the Word, praying, and meeting with other Christians. This will help us become spiritually mature.
item.guid: We need to begin with spiritual milk and move on to spiritual food as quickly as we are able.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: from, milk, to, meat, spiritual, growth, mature, baby, Christians

item.title: In Awe of Your Love
item.description: New believers stand in awe of God's love. They understand how they are loved immensely and owe everything to their Creator.
item.guid: Remember how you once stood in awe of God's love and get back to that place.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: in, awe, of, your, love, God, depth, nothing, separates

item.title: The Truth About Sin
item.description: Sinning against others is sinning against God. We need to vehemently avoid sinning and causing others to sin.
item.guid: The Holy Spirit will help us and convict us, so we can endeavor to live a sin-free life.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: truth, about, sin, God, against, others, Him, avoid, be, pure

item.title: Continually Give Thanks to God
item.description: We all have many reasons to be thankful to God. We need to continually thank Him for who He is, what He has done, and what He will do.
item.guid: God is worthy of our praise and our thanks!
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: continually, give, thanks, to, God, thankful

item.title: God's Cure For the Sin Virus
item.description: Sin is a serious condition and it's even like a virus. Sin has been imputed into humankind through Adam and we all need salvation.
item.guid: God offers us this cure through Jesus Christ.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: God's, cure, for, sin, virus, Jesus, Christ, salvation, justification, redemption

item.title: Losing Your Life For Christ
item.description: We need to lose our life for Christ because He is worthy. Some people are hanging onto their worldly possessions and desires too tightly.
item.guid: Be prepared to let go and let God.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: losing, your, life, for, Christ, let, go, plow, hand, forward

item.title: Use Every Day Wisely
item.description: We cannot waste our time on Earth. We have a limited amount of time and must use it wisely.
item.guid: Take time to rest and enjoy some entertainment, but don't forget the things that are most important.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: use, every, day, wisely, rest, eternal, rewards, Heaven, Jesus

item.title: Seek God's Protection
item.description: God will protect you from evil, but don't forget to ask Him and trust in Him. He is faithful and your biggest ally.
item.guid: Don't look at God as a last resort, but see Him as your best option for protection.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: seek, God's, protection, faithfulness, love, help, Jesus

item.title: Everyone is Important to God
item.description: Everyone is important to God. He cares about us and doesn't see us like others see us. The awesome thing about Christianity is that anyone can please God, despite the things they cannot control.
item.guid: Remember God's faithfulness and love and don't forget that you are important to Him.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: everyone, is, important, to, God, love, faithfulness, Jesus, Christ

item.title: Forgive and Be Forgiven
item.description: Forgiving others is an important part of being a Christian. The Bible probably emphasizes it so much because Christ has forgiven our sins.
item.guid: We should be mindful of God's amazing forgiveness and we should extend the same forgiveness to others.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: forgive, be, forgiven, Bible, forgiveness, love, others

item.title: Avoid Casual Christianity
item.description: God despises casual Christianity. Take your relationship with Jesus Christ seriously.
item.guid: Prioritize time with your Creator and time spent developing your Christ-like character and you'll be blessed and rewarded for your obedience.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: avoid, casual, Christianity, Jesus, Christ, relationship, serious, character, blessed

item.title: Use the Newest Technology For Christ
item.description: The internet and all of the latest devices should be used to bring God glory and the Word of God to people.
item.guid: Christians should be on the cutting edge of technology, so we can discover how to use it to bless others and increase the kingdom of God.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: use, newest, technology, Christ, glorify, God, evangelism, internet, iPhone, podcasting

item.title: Take Care of Your Body
item.description: God has given you your body, so you need to take care of it. You will live a better, happier, and more productive life if you exercise and stay fit.
item.guid: Get stronger so you can serve God longer.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: take, care, of, your, body, Holy, Spirit, stronger, fitness, health, eating

item.title: The Amazing Things God Created
item.description: God created everything and it was very good. He created the greatest creatures to the smallest strains of bacteria. Jesus said He would prepare a place for us in Heaven.
item.guid: Have faith in God's plan and God's Word because He is worthy of our praise and we'll be with Him for eternity.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: amazing, things, God, created, mansions, Leviathan, Behemoth, without, excuse, heavens, earth

item.title: A Life of Joyful Sacrifice
item.description: Christians are called to a life of joyful sacrifice. We will always be serving the Lord and serving others and we must do it with gladness.
item.guid: Pray and seek God and He will bless you with supernatural joy as you serve.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: life, joyful, sacrifice, service, serve, Lord, gladness, serving, obedience

item.title: See God As He Really Is
item.description: We all need to try deeply to see God as He really is.
item.guid: when we see God as He really is, we can begin to understand the deeper things of God and life and everything in between.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: see, God, as, He, really, is, deeper, Lord, relationship, Jesus

item.title: The Suffering of the Saints
item.description: Christians will suffer for their faith and they will be persecuted. Get ready for it now and be determined to stand firm.
item.guid: We will be blessed and rewarded if we can keep God's commands and if we can avoid denying Him.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: suffering, saints, faith, persecuted, ready, blessings, rewards, Jesus, Christ

item.title: The One and Only Faithful Friend
item.description: Despite what anyone thinks about us, despite what anyone says or does, God is always faithful. He is our faithful friend who we can trust and confide in.
item.guid: Develop your relationship with your One faithful friend because others will always be less important than Him.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: one, only, faithful, friend, faithfulness, God, Jesus, generations

item.title: We Are Desperate For God
item.description: We are all desperate for God. When we recognize it, we can humble ourselves and be blessed by Him.
item.guid: Have faith and boldly approach God, so He can meet your needs.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: desperate, for, God, humble, ourselves, boldy, approach, meet, blessed, needs

item.title: God's Grace is Enough
item.description: God's amazing grace has been given to us through Jesus Christ. We are blessed more than we deserve. His grace is God's Riches At Christ's Expense.
item.guid: He has certainly given us more than we deserve.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: God's, amazing, grace, is, enough, Jesus, Christ, salvation, blessings

item.title: Some Promises to Remember
item.description: These are only some of God's awesome promises to humankind. They include His faithfulness, love, deliverance, sanctification, and eternal life.
item.guid: No one except God through Jesus Christ offers us such amazing promises!
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: promises, remember, faithfulness, deliverance, eternal, life, sanctification, love

item.title: Verses With Multiple Meanings
item.description: Some verses in the Bible may have a different meaning than what we think. It's wise to get multiple viewpoints and teachings because they could enhance our studies and our relationship with Christ. Studying the original languages, different translations, and reading books in apologetics will help.
item.guid: Be open to the Holy Spirit's teachings and remember that He'll never contradict the Word of God.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: verses, multiple, meanings, apologetics, Greek, Hebrew, research, study, Holy, Spirit

item.title: Children Are a Gift From God
item.description: Children are a gift from God. Like all of God's gifts, they are a blessing and a responsibility. Plan now to be good to the children in your life. Bless them and point them toward their Heavenly Father.
item.guid: You'll be blessed and rewarded for being a righteous steward of your gifts.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: children, gift, God, blessing, responsibility, train, lead, godly, example, love

item.title: Reasoning and Proving From the Scriptures
item.description: Each Christian must know how to defend the faith. We need to be ready to give an answer in season and out of season, to those who ask why we believe.
item.guid: Prepare now to know and defend the Word of God and your beliefs because God will give you opportunities when you're ready.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: reason, prove, scriptures, defend, faith, apologetics, God, in, season, you

item.title: Not Us, But God Through Us
item.description: If we are obedient and willing, God will work through us. We can be the conduit for amazing things. Get prepared now to do God's will and always give Him credit.
item.guid: We are only stewards of His gifts and power and we need to use them wisely and for His glory.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: not, us, but, God, in, power, humble, credit, honor, praise

item.title: Stay the Course!
item.description: After knowing God's will, we have to be determined to continue doing it. Hardships and temptations will arise. We'll be attacked by the Devil or his minions.
item.guid: However, we need to keep God first and do His will.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: stay, the, course, God, hardships, temptation, Devil, minions

item.title: Our Pre-Suppositional Approach to Knowledge and Wisdom
item.description: After we get saved, God gives us great wisdom and knowledge. He teaches us hidden, secret, and deep spiritual truths. When we talk to unbelievers, we need to remember that they cannot understand these things.
item.guid: They are working from a different pre-supposition and will want you to use theirs, but we must use the pre-supposition of the scriptures and God's inerrant truth.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: pre-suppositional, knowledge, wisdom, scriptures, inerrant, truth, God, understanding, evangelism

item.title: God's Faithfulness to Believers
item.description: God is faithful to believers. He blesses us, keeps us from evil, helps us grow, and become prosperous. Trust in Him and remember His faithfulness at all times.
item.guid: He's there and He's your greatest ally.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: God, faithful, believers, blessings, evil, everywhere, help, complete, work, prosperous

item.title: The Television Generation
item.description: Use your time wisely and glorify God with it. Don't watch things on television that you shouldn't be watching. Remember how God sees everything and is everywhere at once.
item.guid: Avoid being lazy and idle and put pure things in your heart and mind.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: television, generation, glorify, God, pure, whatever, time, wisely

item.title: Do Not Fear or Worry
item.description: Do not fear or worry. These spirits are not from God. God wants us to be strong and confident in His promises.
item.guid: Pray against fear and worry and God will remove them from you.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: do, not, fear, worry, spirits, strong, confident, God, pray

item.title: The Hope That is Within Us
item.description: God has given us the awesome hope of eternal life in Heaven. Appreciate that hope and have faith. God has kept His promises and will keep that promise to us as well.
item.guid: Every believer in Jesus Christ has the hope of God in them.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: hope, within, us, eternal, life, Heaven, awesome, hopeful

item.title: Rebuke Others With Christ's Love
item.description: The scriptures tell us to rebuke other believers who are sinning, so they can repent and be forgiven. We should love them so much that we want to help them live a holy life.
item.guid: Seek God and His words, as you endeavor to love your brothers and sisters in Christ in this way.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: rebuke, others, Christ's, love, believers, sinning, repent, holy, brothers, sisters

item.title: Thou Shalt Not Steal
item.description: Avoid stealing. Recognize possessions as God's and use them wisely and for His glory and His kingdom. Ask forgiveness for anything you have stolen and repent.
item.guid: Choose today to deal honestly and to avoid stealing in the future.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: thou, shalt, not, steal, don't, rob, God, man, stolen

item.title: The Fantastic Freedom of Forgiveness
item.description: It has been said that the time between someone sinning against us and forgiving them determines our character. Avoid holding grudges. Remember that God forgives you, immediately.
item.guid: Forgiving those who hurt you will free you from anger and will bless you more than you know.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: forgiveness, freedom, Jesus, grudges, love, character, 490, forgive, forgiven, forgave

item.title: How the Wise Can Fall
item.description: Fools need to seek wisdom. Wise people need to continue on a godly path. Evil lurks and wants more victims, so we need to be prayerful and careful.
item.guid: Prepare now to be tempted and do everything you can to stay close to Christ.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: wise, fall, foolish, wisdom, God, godly, love, Christ, pray, tongue

item.title: Stay Healthy and Fit
item.description: Everyone needs to exercise and eat healthy foods. We also need to make sure to eat the right amount of food. Too many people don't exercise and eat too much and become lazy and unhealthy.
item.guid: Make a commitment to honor and glorify God with your body and stay healthy and fit.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: health, fitness, eat, exercise, body, right, steward, God, accountable, discipline

item.title: Jesus Christ's Empty Tomb
item.description: Jesus' resurrection is the foundational element of Christianity. Critics have opposed it. Unbelievers don't want to think about it. However, after 2000 years, it still hasn't been disproven! There is more evidence for the resurrection than most people realize.
item.guid: Since Christ was raised, we can have faith that we can be raised as well.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: Jesus, Christ, empty, tomb, resurrection, Easter, life, death

item.title: Evangelize As Much As You Can
item.description: Are you ready to share the good news? Know the scriptures and the gospel and start preparing to share it. God will give you opportunities. Pray for boldness and take advantage of your opportunities.
item.guid: There are people that you will see today that need to know Jesus Christ as their personal Lord and Savior.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: evangelize, share, good, news, scriptures, gospel, Jesus, will, be, done, God

item.title: Accept Wise Rebuke
item.description: Be ready and willing to allow believers in Christ to give you wise, spiritual rebuke. God will speak through them to bless you and help you repent. Wise people who are growing spiritually appreciate rebuke because it gives them a chance to draw closer to Christ.
item.guid: Pray and plan now to avoid taking offense and to accept wise rebuke.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: accept, wise, rebuke, repent, spiritual, believers, love, Christ

item.title: Where Do You Find Meaning in Life?
item.description: Don't let your biggest treasure on Earth be asphalt in Heaven. Number your priorities as God would and endeavor to worship Him and learn from Him.
item.guid: Find meaning in God's ways and you will prosper, you will have peace, and you will be blessed.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: meaning, life, God, ways, prosper, success, peace, will

item.title: First Grace, Then Peace
item.description: In the New Testament, we read the word grace followed by peace over fifteen times. It can be concluded that grace precedes peace and without accepting God's grace and trusting in Jesus Christ for salvation, there is no peace with God.
item.guid: Embrace and experience God's amazing grace, then you will be filled with His peace.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: grace, peace, Jesus, Christ, God, experience, amazing, love, forgiveness

item.title: Jesus Was the Sacrifice For Our Sins
item.description: Jesus Christ gave His life, so we might live. He was the sacrifice for our sins, pleasing to God, so we could be redeemed and have salvation. Trust in Jesus Christ and repent from your sins.
item.guid: Jesus is worthy and will forgive us and put us in right standing with God.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: Jesus, sacrifice, forgive, sins, redeemed, salvation, God

item.title: What the Bible Says About Atheism
item.description: The Bible tells us that fools deny God's existence. God's Word also tells us that these people have no excuse for their unbelief because God's existence and his invisible attributes are clearly seen through nature.
item.guid: They have exalted the creation and the creature above the Creator.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: what, Bible, says, God, atheism, agnosticism, skepticism

item.title: Avoid Apostasy, Be A Berean
item.description: We must study and know the scriptures inside and out. If we don't, new doctrines may come and deceive us. Arm yourself with the Word of God and study it diligently, so you don't believe falsehoods.
item.guid: The Holy Spirit will bless you and guide you as you draw closer to Christ through fellowship, scholarship, and meditation.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: light, upright, God, darkness, shine

item.title: Light For the Upright
item.description: The upright seek and find God's light. He is light and we can be reflections of His light.
item.guid: Walk in the light and you will be blessed and safe.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: light, upright, God, darkness, shine

item.title: God's Amazing Grace
item.description: Have you considered God's amazing grace? Remember that God has blessed you beyond measure, despite what you have said or done.
item.guid: Thank God for the awesome gift of salvation and everything else His amazing grace has given to you.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: God's, amazing, grace, gift, salvation, mercy, love

item.title: Share the Good News, Today!
item.description: We need to share the good news with others. Jesus Christ is the only way to Heaven and we should tell people about Him and why we believe.
item.guid: Don't be ashamed or afraid and obey God's command to evangelize, today.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: evangelize, share, good, news, gospel, now, today, Jesus, salvation

item.title: Keep Giving Thanks to God
item.description: We must always give thanks to God. Every good and perfect gift comes from Him!
item.guid: When you receive earthly blessings, remember who gave them to you and give Him thanks.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: good, perfect, gift, thanks, God, blessings, above, Lord

item.title: Imitate the Lord Jesus Christ
item.description: We must imitate Christ each day. We can follow others as long as they follow Christ, but we must emulate the fruits of the Holy Spirit. When we imitate Christ, we will be blessed, rewarded, and protected from evil.
item.guid: Know the person of Christ and you'll be able to imitate Him.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: imitate, Christ, follow, Lord, Jesus, fruit, Spirit, Holy

item.title: Extend Mercy and Grace to Others
item.description: God has given and continues to give us huge amounts of mercy and grace. We should ask Him for these qualities, so we can have them and extend them to others.
item.guid: When we realize how much we need mercy and grace, we won't have trouble giving it to others.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: extend, mercy, grace, others, God, love, give, forgive

item.title: One Minute After Death
item.description: What happens one minute after death? The scriptures tell us that our faith will be judged. Believers in Christ will go to Heaven and those who reject Him will go to Hell. Next, believers who have done good on Earth will be rewarded for their good deeds.
item.guid: Make sure you repent and believe in Christ, so you don't have to worry about where you'll be one minute after death.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: afterlife, death, one, minute, resurrection, judgment, white, throne, works, life, rewards

item.title: A New Year, A New Beginning!
item.description: The new year brings another chance to repent and live a godlier life. Some of us need to repent of big things, while others need to repent of little things. Either way, God always gives us the opportunity to repent, get things on track, and be refreshed.
item.guid: Use any opportunity you can to get things right and live a better, godlier life!
item.itunes:author: JCSM
item.itunes:keywords: new, year, refresh, renewal, revival, repent, change, life

item.title: Meditate On Christ's Virgin Birth
item.description: Jesus Christ was born of a virgin. He was not a human creation, but He was and is the uncreated God. Consequently, He had no imputed sin.
item.guid: Meditate on Christ's virgin birth and what He means to the world.
item.itunes:author: JCSM
